typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EQP_SCHED_ID as integer,
		AC_RGSTRN as string,
		STS_CD as string,
		STS_NAME as string,
		STS_DESC as string,
		STRT_TIME as string,
		END_TIME as string,
		NOTE as string,
		IS_DELD as boolean,
		UPDTD_AT as string,
		ADF_TIME_STMP as timestamp,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StgEquipSchd
StgEquipSchd aggregate(groupBy(AC_RGSTRN,
		STS_CD,
		STRT_TIME),
	each(match(name!='AC_RGSTRN'&&name!='STS_CD'&&name!='STRT_TIME'), $$ = iif(first(UPDTD_AT)>last(UPDTD_AT),first($$),last($$)))) ~> DistinctRows
